meanings.definition: The state or quality of being calm and composed.
meanings.sent1: Her collectednesses during the storm impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His collectednesses in stressful situations always stood out.
meanings.sent3: Despite the chaos, her collectednesses never wavered.
meanings.sent4: In the face of adversity, his collectednesses shone like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The collectednesses of the old oak tree in the storm was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The act of gathering or bringing together in one place.
meanings.sent1: The collectednesses of all the toys in the toy chest made it easy to find what she wanted.
meanings.sent2: The collectednesses of the scattered papers on the desk took hours to sort through.
meanings.sent3: The collectednesses of the ingredients on the kitchen counter made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The collectednesses of the scattered leaves in the yard resembled a beautiful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The collectednesses of the books on the shelf created a sense of order in the room.

meanings.definition: The ability to maintain control over one's emotions or thoughts.
meanings.sent1: His collectednesses helped him stay focused during the exam.
meanings.sent2: She admired his collectednesses in handling difficult situations.
meanings.sent3: Even in the face of criticism, his collectednesses never faltered.
meanings.sent4: Her collectednesses were like a shield against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The collectednesses of the monk were truly inspiring to all who met him.
